alert.note: Alert for Coastal Miami Dade County; Far South Miami-Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Mainland Monroe (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 11:46PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Mainland Monroe and southern Miami-Dade Counties through 1245 AM EDT... At 1145 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms south of Homestead General Airport, moving northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Homestead, Turkey Point, Homestead Miami Speedway, Homestead General Airport, The Redland, Florida City, Loop Road Ee Center, Homestead Base, Naranja, Royal Palm Ranger, Leisure City, Shark Valley Obs Tower, Pa-Hay- Okee Overlook, Fortymile Bend, Homestead Bayfront Park, Ocean Reef, Everglades National Park and Princeton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Miami Dade County; Far South Miami-Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Mainland Monroe
